channel.title: Steam Update Validation Loop?
channel.description: Hey, I was wondering if anyone has been having this problem when trying to install patch 0.0.2 on Steam where the installation just keeps re-validating and not actually installing? Its been like this for a couple of hours now, and I was wondering if anyone was having the same problem?
